example.eg: The mother cut her kid's food into smaller pieces.
example.egtrans: 母亲把孩子的食物切成小块。

example.eg: Please give me a piece of the apple pie.
I picked up the pieces of the broken plate.

dsense.name: piece
dsense.guideword: (item in a set) (一组或一套中的)

example.eg: My new dinner set has thirty-four pieces.
example.egtrans: 我的新餐具整套共有三十四件。

example.eg: This piece of art really shows Warhol's style.
example.egtrans: 这件艺术作品确实体现出了沃霍尔的风格。

example.eg: That piece by Bach was very nice.
example.egtrans: 那首巴赫的音乐作品非常好听。

example.eg: This jigsaw puzzle's got 1000 pieces!
After rolling the dice, she moved her piece forward five spaces.
example.egtrans: 摇了色子之后，她将棋子向前移动了五步。

example.eg: He paid twenty gold pieces for the land.
The guys did what the gangster said after he showed his piece.
example.egtrans: 歹徒掏出了手枪，那些人就照他说的做了。

example.eg: He wrote a piece on the dangers of radon.
example.egtrans: 他写了一篇关于氡的危害的文章。

example.eg: Ayckbourn's latest play is an entertaining piece.
example.egtrans: 艾克伯恩最新的剧作很有趣。

dsense.name: a piece
dsense.guideword: UK, regional (a distance, a way) (路程)

example.eg: The farm is down the road a piece.
The new software installation was a piece of cake, no problems!
If I'm to help you, I want a piece of the action.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 参与其中, 从中获利

dsense.name: a piece of work, a real piece of work
a piece of work, a real piece of work

example.eg: Tommy's a real piece of work; I heard he blamed his mistake on the boss.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 难搞定的人, 难相处的人

example.eg: Jane bought the table as an accent piece for the living room.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 装饰件, 让房间亮眼的家具

example.eg: Gloria was wearing an all-in-one.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （胸罩和腰带连一起的）紧身内衣, 紧身胸衣

example.eg: Rooks, pawns and bishops are all examples of chess pieces.
I don't like David's new tattoo, but it's certainly a conversation piece!

dsense.name: game piece
dsense.guideword: (counter or token used in a game)

example.eg: We couldn't play chess because he lost a game piece.

dsense.name: give [sb] a piece of your mind

example.eg: The driver was lucky to survive the crash in one piece.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 安然无恙地, 毫发无伤地

example.eg: I don't think that arithmetic problem is difficult. It's a piece of cake!
example.egtrans: 我认为那道算术题不难。小菜一碟！

dsense.name: Lego brick, Lego block, a piece of Lego, also US: Lego

example.eg: That old musket won't fire; it's just a museum piece.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 博物馆馆藏品，值得收藏在博物馆的古董, 过时的人，过时的物品，老古董

example.eg: That woman is a nasty piece of work.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 令人讨厌的人, 令人厌恶的人
聚会上的娱乐活动, 社交场合的表演节目

example.eg: The exhibition showcases a stunning collection of period pieces created during the Ming Dynasty.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 某个时代特有的家具（装饰品等），古物, 古装片，古装戏剧

example.eg: The play is a period piece set in the 19th century.
Following the accident, Sheila recovered her memory piece by piece.
She very carefully picked up the shards of glass piece by piece.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一片一片地, 一块一块地

dsense.name: piece de resistance, pièce de résistance, plural: pieces de resistance

example.eg: The main course was delicious but the piece de resistance was the dessert.

dsense.name: piece de resistance, pièce de résistance, plural: pieces de resistance

trans_examp.trans_cn: 关键部分, 要害部分

example.eg: I´ll give you just one piece of advice, young man: stay away from that girl.
Several pieces of art were stolen from the museum.

dsense.name: piece of ass
dsense.guideword: US, offensive, vulgar, slang (attractive woman) (俚语，粗俗，无礼)

example.eg: Would you like a piece of cake?
The spelling test was a piece of cake; I got all the answers right!
example.egtrans: 拼写测试简直小菜一碟，我全部答对了！

example.eg: The police were unable to unearth the piece of evidence they needed to convict him.

dsense.name: piece of furniture, item of furniture

example.eg: All the pieces of furniture in the house are made of pine.
That's not an antique: it's a piece of junk!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…列入考虑范围, 考虑到

example.eg: They're planning to build a supermarket on that piece of land.

dsense.name: piece of meat
dsense.guideword: figurative (person seen as sex object) (泄欲对象)

example.eg: Candice has a piece of news for us; she's getting married!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一则新闻, 一条消息

example.eg: I'm writing a poem with a black pen on this red piece of paper.
The management are not responsible for pieces of property stolen from customers' cars.
Why do I have to accept that piece of s*** in my group?

dsense.name: piece of s***
dsense.guideword: vulgar, offensive, slang ([sth] worthless, badly made)

example.eg: If that car only cost you a couple hundred dollars, it's probably a piece of s***!

dsense.name: piece of tat
dsense.guideword: UK, pejorative, informal ([sth] cheap and tacky)

example.eg: The shop mainly sells pieces of tat.
That guy's a piece of trash; don't have anything to do with him.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 废物, 蠢货, 无用的人

example.eg: The novel is a magnificent piece of work which is beautifully written.
It was hard to piece together what he meant.
I pieced together a bookshelf from boards and cement blocks.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 按件数付费的工作, 计件工

dsense.name: set piece
dsense.guideword: (film, book: scene or extract) (戏剧、音乐、绘画等遵循著名的固定模式或风格的)

example.eg: At the end of the film, there is a set piece involving a gun battle.
The soccer players were trying out set pieces during their training session.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 按照计划执行的事情, 精心部署下的行动

dsense.name: three-piece
dsense.guideword: informal (music group with 3 members) (音乐团体)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 三件套的，三件一套的，三件式
三件套的，三件一套的，三件式

example.eg: My brother looks surprisingly good in a three-piece-suit.
Glenn has just bought a new three-piece suite.
She wore a two-piece swimsuit to the beach party.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 比基尼, 两件式泳衣, 两截式泳衣
